page.title: 12HEALTH SERVICES _ DUNDONALD
page.content: The modern Health Centre in Dundonald offers a wide range of services. Because the village is more than three miles from the nearest Chemist, local people can,after seeing one of the doctors, have their prescriptions filled there on the spot from a well_stocked dispensary. The Child Welfare Clinic is also housed in the Health Centre. Mothers can take their childern there for innoculations and to receive advice on looking after their families. Mothers can buy baby food,vitamins, orange juice,etc. there on a token system. Mothers can have their own health looked after at the Ante_Natal Clinic where a Health Visitor is always on duty. Once a week, the Clinic receives a visit from a Social Worker.
